DOC.brief_summary: Results observational study suggest small beneficial association protein blood pressure may mainly attributable intake protein plant source . In epidemiological study biomarkers dietary intake useful estimate intake reliably . Dietary study use biomarkers protein intake generally show strong association health outcome . However , data biomarkers specific type protein ( e.g . dairy , meat , grain legume ) scarce . Therefore purpose study identify new biomarkers intake protein meat , dairy grain . In addition secondary purpose investigate whether intake protein source influence kidney filtration rate urinary acid excretion differentially .
DOC.criteria: Age 1840 year BMI 18.5 30 kg/m2 Healthy ( As judge participant ) Written informed consent obtain Unable unwilling comply study procedure . Unusual dietary pattern , include high alcohol intake ( ≥ 2 glasses/day ) vegetarian diet Recent ( < 4 week ) current participation study investigational drug dietary intervention Usage energy restrict diet last two month Weight loss weight gain 5 kg last two month Smoking Stomach bowel diseases Kidney disorder Diabetes , thyroid disease , endocrine disorder Prevalent cardiovascular disease Extreme sport ( > 8h/ wk ) Usage prescribe medication except oral contraceptive Use systemic antibiotic period 3 month prior study For woman : pregnant lactating For woman : use oral contraceptive For woman : Unwilling use oral contraceptive consecutively least total study duration Liver function parameter ( ALAT , ASAT , γGT ) renal function parameter ( Serum creatinin ) outside normal range
